Introduction

Ye-A was a girl group initially under Kiroy Company, and later SHINHOO Entertainment. They debuted on July 18, 2014 with their only single "National Treasure". After Kiroy Company was purchased by SHINHOO Entertainment, updates of the girl group were no longer released. They are assumed to have disbanded sometime in late 2015 without any official statement.
